columnDefinition.name: File
columnDefinition.description: Path of the .json file to modify.

columnDefinition.name: ElementPath
columnDefinition.description: >The path to the parent element of the element to be modified. Either JSON Path or JSON Pointer semantics.

columnDefinition.name: VerifyPath
columnDefinition.description: The JSON Path query run from ElementPath to verify whether a repair is necessary. Also used to uninstall.

columnDefinition.name: Name
columnDefinition.description: Name of JSON property to modify.

columnDefinition.name: Value
columnDefinition.description: The value to set. May be one of the simple JSON types, or a JSON-formatted object.

columnDefinition.name: Component_
columnDefinition.description: Foreign key into the Component table referencing the component that controls the execution of the JSON file modification.

columnDefinition.name: Sequence
columnDefinition.description: Order to execute the JSON file modifications.
